typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		product_id as integer,
		product_name as string,
		unit_price as double,
		product_desc as string,
		eligible_promotion as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> sourceStage
source(output(
		product_key as integer,
		product_id as integer,
		product_name as string,
		unit_price as double,
		product_desc as string,
		eligible_promotion as integer,
		start_date as timestamp,
		end_date as timestamp,
		active_flag as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> sourceTarget
source(output(
		MaxKey as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select ISNULL(max(product_key),0) as MaxKey from dbo.product_dim_trgt',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> sourceMaxSurrogateKey
JoinForSurrogateKey keyGenerate(output(SurrogateKeyIncrement as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey
sourceStage, sourceMaxSurrogateKey join(true(),
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinForSurrogateKey
SurrogateKey derive(active_flag = 1,
		start_date = currentTimestamp(),
		product_key = MaxKey+SurrogateKeyIncrement) ~> DerivedColumnsInsert
FilterActiveColumns, sourceStage exists(sourceTarget@product_id == sourceStage@product_id,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ExistsUpdate
SelectOldRecordsOnly derive(end_date = currentTimestamp(),
		active_flag = 0) ~> DerivedColumnsUpdate
DerivedColumnsUpdate alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> UpdateAlterRow
sourceTarget filter(active_flag==1) ~> FilterActiveColumns
ExistsUpdate, DerivedColumnsInsert exists(sourceTarget@product_id == sourceStage@product_id,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> SelectOldRecordsOnly
DerivedColumnsInsert sink(input(
		product_key as integer,
		product_id as integer,
		product_name as string,
		unit_price as double,
		product_desc as string,
		eligible_promotion as integer,
		start_date as timestamp,
		end_date as timestamp,
		active_flag as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	mapColumn(
		product_id,
		product_key,
		product_name,
		unit_price,
		product_desc,
		eligible_promotion,
		start_date,
		active_flag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> InsertSink
UpdateAlterRow sink(input(
		product_key as integer,
		product_id as integer,
		product_name as string,
		unit_price as double,
		product_desc as string,
		eligible_promotion as integer,
		start_date as timestamp,
		end_date as timestamp,
		active_flag as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['product_id'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	mapColumn(
		product_id,
		product_key,
		product_name,
		unit_price,
		product_desc,
		eligible_promotion,
		start_date,
		end_date,
		active_flag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> UpdateSink
